gajaba supar kros 2010 motar ratha ha yathuru padi dhawana tharagawaliye motar ratha dhawana anshaye surathawa arawinda premadasa wisin himikaragath athara, yathurupadi dhawana anshaye surathawa sama lakunu labaganimin gayan sandaruwan saha indiya kridaka si.es. santhosh himikaragathha.anuradhapura, saliyapura, gajaba rejimenthu dhawana pitiye di pereda yuddha hamudapathi mejar jenaral jagath jayasuriya mahathage pradhanathwayen tharagawaliya aarambha keruni.motar ratha dhawanatharaga isaw 13k saha yathuru padi dhawana tharaga isaw 09kin supar kros motar ratha ha yathurupadi dhawana tharagawaliya samanwitha wiya.
